BodyName: Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to aligning the requirements of the Earned Safe and Sick Time Act and the Temporary Schedule Change Act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Aligning the requirements of the Earned Safe and Sick Time Act and the Temporary Schedule Change Act

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of consumer and worker protection to confirm receipt of complaints related to fair work practices and to notify the person or entity under investigation of the receipt of the complaint
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of consumer and worker protection to confirm receipt of complaints related to fair work practices and to notify the person or entity under investigation of the receipt of the complaint.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to aligning the requirements of the Earned Safe and Sick Time Act and the Temporary Schedule Change Act
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Aligning the requirements of the Earned Safe and Sick Time Act and the Temporary Schedule Change Act

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of consumer and worker protection to confirm receipt of complaints related to fair work practices and to notify the person or entity under investigation of the receipt of the complaint
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
